author: Nostalgia Nerd
description:
Full video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ppwNUU5j12M ~ Most consoles fade into history. But this Sega machine refuses to die. Decades after its 1980s debut, it’s still being produced brand new — with games, hardware, and fans keeping it alive.

In this video, we look at how and why this retro console continues to exist in 2025; who’s still making it; and what it says about Sega’s legacy in gaming history.

#Sega #RetroGaming #RetroTech #GamingHistory #8bit #SegaForever
title: Sega Console STILL Being Made 40 Years Later
